info.description: This is a RESTful API for a simple social media application. It allows users to manage their posts, including creating, updating, and deleting posts, and provides authentication using JWT. The API is built using the Fiber framework and interacts with a PostgreSQL database.
info.title: RAION ASSESSMENT API

put.description: Update your password securely. You need to be logged in and provide your old password along with the new one. Include your JWT token in the Authorization header.

400.description: Validation error or invalid request format

get.description: Retrieve details about the logged-in user. You must include your JWT token in the Authorization header to access this information.

post.description: Log in to your account by providing your email and password. If the details are correct, you will receive a JWT token to use for secure access to other endpoints.
Create a new account by providing a username, email, and password. The system checks if the details are valid and returns a success message if registration is successful.

delete.description: Delete a comment by its ID. Only the comment creator can delete it. Requires authentication.

get.description: Get a list of all posts, along with details like the user who created them, the caption, image URL, and timestamps.

post.description: Create a new post with a caption. Optionally, you can upload an image. If an image is uploaded, its URL will be returned in the response. Requires JWT authentication.

get.description: Get all posts made by a specific user, including the caption, image URL, and timestamps.
get.summary: Get all posts by a specific user

200.description: Successful fetch posts by user response

get.description: Get a post by its unique ID, including the caption, image URL, and timestamps.

put.description: Update only the caption of an existing post. Only the post creator is allowed to make this change. Requires JWT authentication.

delete.description: Delete a post by its ID. Only the post creator is allowed to delete it. Requires JWT authentication.

get.description: Retrieve all comments related to a specific post.

post.description: Create a comment for a post. Requires authentication.
Allows a user to like a post. Requires JWT authentication.

get.description: Fetch all users who liked a specific post
get.summary: Get all likes for a post

200.description: List of users who liked the post

post.description: Allows a user to remove their like from a post. Requires JWT authentication.

get.description: Search for posts that match a given query, such as a keyword in the caption or content.
Search for users by their name or email.
Retrieve a list of all users from the database.

put.description: Update the username of the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific user by their ID.

200.description: Successful fetch user by ID response

get.description: Fetch all posts liked by a specific user
get.summary: Get all likes by a user

200.description: List of posts liked by the user
